page.title: 14N.TONBRIDGE FASHION:MODERN
page.content: In our interview with 2 people in their twenties we learnt that women's fashions are reverting to the 60's look eg mini_skirts.The prices have risen.Hairstyles now are wilder and formerly people wore duller coloured, more straightforward clothes.Studs and chains are less fashionable than a few years ago.Hats have not been popular for many years.Men's suits in the 70's were similar to those of the 60's but were of plainer line with no flared trousers.Double_breasted jackets are returning and shirts and jerseys more popular.Casual clothes are now gener_ ally smarter.Trousers now are baggier and wider whereas in the mid_70's clothes were tight.Hair is worn much shorter now than in the 70's."Punk" spikey hairstyles are very recent. Jeans were very popular in the 70's and still are.
